review_title: Being a native clinic you’d think they would support Native American employees but they are often left overlooked
job_title: Medical Supply Manager in Oklahoma City, OK
pros: Benefits are great. Working with the medical staff is great but they are often not given the recognition they deserve.
cons: Pay is not very good. Lack of support from upper management. Not able to advance if you are Native American. Putting people with no education over employees that have one. A lot of turnovers. Upper management run off employees.

pros: Great management. Work schedule and benefits are great!!! Love my co-workers!
